original_text: Blessed shall you be when you come in, and blessed shall you be when you go out.
korean_text: 네가 들어와도 복을 받고 나가도 복을 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Blessed shall you be when you come in
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 들어올 때 복을 받을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and blessed shall you be when you go out
